      • getContentById

        public Future<ContentBean> getContentById(String id,
                                          int version,
                                          List<String> expand)
        Description copied from interface: ContentClient
        Get Content by ID
        Specified by:
        getContentById in interface ContentClient
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the content
        version - The Version of the content
        expand - A List of Fields to expand
        Returns:
        A Future with the ContentBean

      • getContent

        public Future<ContentResultsBean> getContent(ContentType type,
                                             String spacekey,
                                             String title,
                                             ContentStatus status,
                                             Date postingDay,
                                             List<String> expand,
                                             int start,
                                             int limit)
        Description copied from interface: ContentClient
        Returns a paginated list of Content.
        Specified by:
        getContent in interface ContentClient
        Parameters:
        type - the content type to return. Default value: page. Valid values: page, blogpost.
        spacekey - the space key to find content under.
        title - the title of the page to find. Required for page type.
        status - list of statuses the content to be found is in. Defaults to current is not specified. If set to 'any', content in 'current' and 'trashed' status will be fetched. Does not support 'historical' status for now.
        postingDay - the posting day of the blog post.
        expand - a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. Default value: history,space,version.
        start - the start point of the collection to return
        limit - the limit of the number of items to return, this may be restricted by fixed system limits
        Returns:
        A Future with the ContentResultsBean

      • getComment

        public Future<CommentResultsBean> getComment(String spacekey,
                                             String title,
                                             ContentStatus status,
                                             Date postingDay,
                                             List<String> expand,
                                             int start,
                                             int limit)
        Description copied from interface: ContentClient
        Returns a paginated list of Comment.
        Specified by:
        getComment in interface ContentClient
        Parameters:
        spacekey - the space key to find content under.
        title - the title of the page under wich find comments.
        status - list of statuses the content to be found is in. Defaults to current is not specified. If set to 'any', content in 'current' and 'trashed' status will be fetched. Does not support 'historical' status for now.
        postingDay - the posting day of the blog post.
        expand - a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. Default value: history,space,version.
        start - the start point of the collection to return
        limit - the limit of the number of items to return, this may be restricted by fixed system limits
        Returns:
        A Future with the CommentResultsBean
